item.title: Microsoft says Azure affected after cables cut in the Red Sea
item.description: It's not clear who cut the cables or why.

item.title: Are bad incentives to blame for AI hallucinations?
item.description: How can a chatbot be so wrong — and sound so confident in its wrongness?

item.title: Koah raises $5M to bring ads into AI apps
item.description: One investor says Koah is "building the essential monetization layer for consumer AI."

item.title: Hyundai’s eVTOL startup Supernal pauses work following CEO and CTO departures
item.description: The shakeup comes as the startup was still struggling to get its test vehicle off the ground -- literally. The first flight was only in March.

item.title: What is Mistral AI? Everything to know about the OpenAI competitor
